title: Throw all the "games are based on mmr stats" my way, this should not be happening
body: Right from the start it was apparent this Niv was way better than the other mid laner, and this Kha was really good too. Boo hoo we had a silver 2 and a silver 3. That didn't matter because the two plats were stomping so hard (okay maybe not stomping but they were doing really well). If "balancing" means you have really good and really bad players on a team, that is horse shit. The Jhin may have ended up with a decent KDA at the end but he started out 1/6/1. It was because we had two players that blew out the competition that we won. Guess what, I won this game and I am still mad at the system. It just creates a jumble of skill that makes for ridiculous games. This was ranked btw.
